generated_description: indigma modern indian bistro is an indian restaurant located in mount vernon, baltimore that offers traditional indian cuisine with a modern twist. the restaurant serves breakfast buffets with a unique blend of indian and continental cuisine, as well as healthy choices such as lamb, chicken, seafood, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options for lunch and dinner. indigma also offers a variety of small plates and entrees for dinner, including innovative or traditional favorites made with farm-fresh ingredients. the menu features a range of healthy and flavorful options prepared with farm fresh ingredients.
